file_insights.changes_summary: Added Scope class with hierarchical symbol management
key_additions: Methods for symbol lookup and management

gotchas_discovered: Need to handle case-insensitive identifier comparisons
Potential performance considerations with recursive symbol lookup
Careful management of scope start and end offsets
recommendations: Implement symbol lookup that traverses parent scopes
Add robust error handling for symbol resolution
Consider performance optimization for large scope trees
Add unit tests for scope and symbol management logic
